issue.title: DRC Vehicle can't make sharp turns

content.raw: Same test as previous driving test but this time it moves for 2.5s in forwards and backwards direction.  When the breaks are applied at the end the wheel is also straightened out to ensure that it's in the neutral position before the next test starts.  Note how bad turning is when going in reverse.
content.html: Same test as previous driving test but this time it moves for 2.5s in forwards and backwards direction. When the breaks are applied at the end the wheel is also straightened out to ensure that it's in the neutral position before the next test starts. Note how bad turning is when going in reverse.
